00046         private sealed class ConcatCollection : ICollection
00047         {
00048             private sealed class ConcatEnumerator : IEnumerator
00049             {
00050                 private IEnumerator enumerator1, enumerator2;
00051 
00052                 private bool isEnumator1Current;
00053 
00054                 public ConcatEnumerator(ConcatCollection union)
00055                 {
00056                     this.enumerator1 = union.c1.GetEnumerator();
00057                     this.enumerator2 = union.c2.GetEnumerator();
00058                     this.isEnumator1Current = true;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 public void Reset()
00062                 {
00063                     enumerator1.Reset();
00064                     enumerator2.Reset();
00065                     isEnumator1Current = true;
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 public object Current
00069                 {
00070                     get
00071                     {
00072                         if(isEnumator1Current)
00073                         {
00074                             return enumerator1.Current;
00075                         }
00076                         
00077                         return enumerator2.Current;
00078                     }
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 public bool MoveNext()
00082                 {
00083                     if(isEnumator1Current && enumerator1.MoveNext())
00084                     {
00085                         return true;
00086                     }
00087 
00088                     isEnumator1Current = false;
00089                     return enumerator2.MoveNext();
00090                 }
00091             }
00092 
00093             private ICollection c1, c2;
00094 
00095             public ConcatCollection(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00096             {
00097                 this.c1 = c1;
00098                 this.c2 = c2;
00099             }
00100 
00101 
00102             public bool IsSynchronized
00103             {
00104                 get { return c1.IsSynchronized && c2.IsSynchronized; }
00105             }
00106 
00107             public int Count
00108             {
00109                 get { return c1.Count + c2.Count; }
00110             }
00111 
00112             public void CopyTo(Array array, int index)
00113             {
00114                 int indexArray = index;
00115 
00116                 foreach(object obj in c1)
00117                 {
00118                     array.SetValue(obj, indexArray++);
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 foreach(object obj in c2)
00122                 {
00123                     array.SetValue(obj, indexArray++);
00124                 }
00125             }
00126 
00127             public object SyncRoot
00128             {
00129                 get { return c1.SyncRoot; }
00130             }
00131 
00132             public IEnumerator GetEnumerator()
00133             {
00134                 return new ConcatEnumerator(this);
00135             }
00136         }

00144         [Obsolete("Use Set<T>.Intersect() instead.", false)]
00145         private sealed class InterCollection : ICollection
00146         {
00147             private ArrayList intersection;
00148 
00149             public InterCollection(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00150             {
00151                 // swap in order to have <c>c1.Count <= c2.Count</c>
00152                 if(c1.Count > c2.Count)
00153                 {
00154                     ICollection c1Bis = c1;
00155                     c1 = c2;
00156                     c2 = c1Bis;
00157                 }
00158 
00159                 Hashtable table = new Hashtable(c1.Count);
00160                 foreach(object obj in c1)
00161                 {
00162                     if(!table.Contains(obj))
00163                     {
00164                         table.Add(obj, null);
00165                     }
00166                 }
00167 
00168                 // building the intersection
00169                 intersection = new ArrayList();
00170                 foreach(object obj in c2)
00171                 {
00172                     if(table.Contains(obj))
00173                     {
00174                         intersection.Add(obj);
00175                         table.Remove(obj);
00176                     }
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 intersection.TrimToSize();
00180             }
00181 
00182             #region ICollection Members
00183 
00184             public IEnumerator GetEnumerator()
00185             {
00186                 return intersection.GetEnumerator();
00187             }
00188 
00189             public bool IsSynchronized
00190             {
00191                 get { return intersection.IsSynchronized; }
00192             }
00193 
00194             public int Count
00195             {
00196                 get { return intersection.Count; }
00197             }
00198 
00199             public void CopyTo(Array array, int index)
00200             {
00201                 intersection.CopyTo(array, index);
00202             }
00203 
00204             public object SyncRoot
00205             {
00206                 get { return intersection.SyncRoot; }
00207             }
00208 
00209             #endregion
00210         }
00211 
00216         [Obsolete("Use Set<T>.Union() instead.", false)]
00217         private sealed class UnionCollection : ICollection
00218         {
00219             private ArrayList union;
00220 
00221             public UnionCollection(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00222             {
00223                 Hashtable table1 = new Hashtable(c1.Count);
00224                 foreach(object obj in c1)
00225                 {
00226                     if(!table1.Contains(obj))
00227                     {
00228                         table1.Add(obj, null);
00229                     }
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 Hashtable table2 = new Hashtable(c2.Count);
00233                 foreach(object obj in c2)
00234                 {
00235                     if(!table2.Contains(obj))
00236                     {
00237                         table2.Add(obj, null);
00238                     }
00239                 }
00240 
00241                 // building the union
00242                 union = new ArrayList(Math.Max(table1.Count, table2.Count));
00243                 union.AddRange(table1.Keys);
00244                 foreach(object obj in c2)
00245                 {
00246                     if(!table1.Contains(obj))
00247                     {
00248                         union.Add(obj);
00249                     }
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 union.TrimToSize();
00253             }
00254 
00255             #region ICollection Members
00256 
00257             public bool IsSynchronized
00258             {
00259                 get { return union.IsSynchronized; }
00260             }
00261 
00262             public int Count
00263             {
00264                 get { return union.Count; }
00265             }
00266 
00267             public void CopyTo(Array array, int index)
00268             {
00269                 union.CopyTo(array, index);
00270             }
00271 
00272             public IEnumerator GetEnumerator()
00273             {
00274                 return union.GetEnumerator();
00275             }
00276 
00277             public object SyncRoot
00278             {
00279                 get { return union.SyncRoot; }
00280             }
00281 
00282             #endregion
00283         }

00290         [Obsolete("Use Set<T>.Subtract() instead.", false)]
00291         private sealed class MinusCollection : ICollection
00292         {
00293             private ArrayList minus;
00294 
00295             public MinusCollection(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00296             {
00297                 Hashtable table1 = new Hashtable(c1.Count);
00298                 foreach(object obj in c1)
00299                 {
00300                     if(!table1.Contains(obj))
00301                     {
00302                         table1.Add(obj, null);
00303                     }
00304                 }
00305 
00306                 Hashtable table2 = new Hashtable(c2.Count);
00307                 foreach(object obj in c2)
00308                 {
00309                     if(!table2.Contains(obj))
00310                     {
00311                         table2.Add(obj, null);
00312                     }
00313                 }
00314 
00315                 // building minus collection
00316                 minus = new ArrayList(Math.Max(c1.Count - c2.Count, 10));
00317                 foreach(object obj in table1.Keys)
00318                 {
00319                     if(!table2.Contains(obj))
00320                     {
00321                         minus.Add(obj);
00322                     }
00323                 }
00324 
00325                 minus.TrimToSize();
00326             }
00327 
00328             #region ICollection Members
00329 
00330             public bool IsSynchronized
00331             {
00332                 get { return minus.IsSynchronized; }
00333             }
00334 
00335             public int Count
00336             {
00337                 get { return minus.Count; }
00338             }
00339 
00340             public void CopyTo(Array array, int index)
00341             {
00342                 minus.CopyTo(array, index);
00343             }
00344 
00345             public IEnumerator GetEnumerator()
00346             {
00347                 return minus.GetEnumerator();
00348             }
00349 
00350             public object SyncRoot
00351             {
00352                 get { return minus.SyncRoot; }
00353             }
00354 
00355             #endregion
00356         }

00366         public static ICollection Concat(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00367         {
00368             if(c1 == null)
00369             {
00370                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c1", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c1"));
00371             }
00372 
00373             if(c2 == null)
00374             {
00375                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c2", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c2"));
00376             }
00377 
00378             return new ConcatCollection(c1, c2);
00379         }
00380 
00393         [Obsolete("Use Set<T>.Intersect() instead.", false)]
00394         public static ICollection Inter(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00395         {
00396             if(c1 == null)
00397             {
00398                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c1", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c1"));
00399             }
00400 
00401             if(c2 == null)
00402             {
00403                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c2", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c2"));
00404             }
00405 
00406             return new InterCollection(c1, c2);
00407         }

00417         public static ICollection Minus(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00418         {
00419             if(c1 == null)
00420             {
00421                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c1", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c1"));
00422             }
00423 
00424             if(c2 == null)
00425             {
00426                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c2", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c2"));

00438         public static ICollection Product(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00439         {
00440             if(c1 == null)
00441             {
00442                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c1", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c1"));
00443             }
00444 
00445             if(c2 == null)
00446             {
00447                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c2", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c2"));
00448             }
00449 
00450             return null;
00451         }

00465         [Obsolete("Use Set<T>.Union() instead.", false)]
00466         public static ICollection Union(ICollection c1, ICollection c2)
00467         {
00468             if(c1 == null)
00469             {
00470                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c1", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c1"));
00471             }
00472 
00473             if(c2 == null)
00474             {
00475                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c2", string.Format(Resources.ArgumentNull, "c2"));
00476             }
00477 
00478             return new UnionCollection(c1, c2);
00479         }

00482         #region NUnit testing suite

00487         [TestFixture]
00488         public class TestingSuite
00489         {
00493             [Test] public void ConcatCount()
00494             {
00495                 int[] array0 = new int[0], array1 = new int[7], array2 = new int[13];
00496 
00497                 Assert.AreEqual(array0.Length + array0.Length,
00498                     (new ConcatCollection(array0, array0)).Count, "#A00");
00499                 Assert.AreEqual(array0.Length + array1.Length,
00500                     (new ConcatCollection(array0, array1)).Count, "#A01");
00501                 Assert.AreEqual(array0.Length + array2.Length,
00502                     (new ConcatCollection(array0, array2)).Count, "#A02");
00503 
00504                 Assert.AreEqual(array1.Length + array0.Length,
00505                     (new ConcatCollection(array1, array0)).Count, "#A03");
00506                 Assert.AreEqual(array1.Length + array1.Length,
00507                     (new ConcatCollection(array1, array1)).Count, "#A04");
00508                 Assert.AreEqual(array1.Length + array2.Length,
00509                     (new ConcatCollection(array1, array2)).Count, "#A05");
00510             }
00511 
00515             [Test] public void ConcatGetEnumerator()
00516             {
00517                 // generating two arrays
00518                 int[] array1 = new int[10], array2 = new int[13];
00519                 for(int i = 0; i < array1.Length; i++) array1[i] = i;
00520                 for(int i = 0; i < array2.Length; i++) array2[i] = i + array1.Length;
00521 
00522                 ConcatCollection union = new ConcatCollection(array1, array2);
00523 
00524                 int index = 0;
00525 
00526                 foreach(int value in union)
00527                 {
00528                     Assert.AreEqual(index++, value, "#A00 Unexpected value in collection.");
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 Assert.AreEqual(array1.Length + array2.Length, index, 
00532                     "#A01 Unexpected count of enumerated element in collection.");
00533             }
00534 
00538             [Test] public void InterGetEnumerator()
00539             {
00540                 int LENGTH = 100;
00541                 int[] array1 = new int[LENGTH], array2 = new int[LENGTH];
00542 
00543                 for(int i = 0; i < LENGTH; i++)
00544                 {
00545                     array1[i] = i;
00546                     array2[i] = i / 2;
00547                 }
00548 
00549                 ICollection intersection = Collection.Inter(array1, array2);
00550 
00551                 Assert.AreEqual(LENGTH / 2, intersection.Count,
00552                     "#A00 Unexpected intersection count.");
00553 
00554                 foreach(int i in intersection)
00555                     Assert.IsTrue(i >= 0 && i <= LENGTH,
00556                         "#A01-" + i + " Unexpected intersection item.");
00557             }
00558 
00562             [Test] public void MinusGetEnumerator()
00563             {
00564                 int LENGTH = 100;
00565                 int[] array1 = new int[LENGTH], array2 = new int[LENGTH];
00566 
00567                 for(int i = 0; i < LENGTH; i++)
00568                 {
00569                     array1[i] = i;
00570                     array2[i] = i / 2;
00571                 }
00572 
00573                 ICollection minus = Collection.Minus(array1, array2);
00574                 
00575                 Assert.AreEqual(LENGTH / 2, minus.Count,
00576                     "#A00 Unexpected minus count.");
00577 
00578                 foreach(int i in minus)
00579                     Assert.IsTrue(i >= LENGTH / 2,
00580                         "#A01-" + i + " Unexpected minus item.");
00581             }
00582 
00586             [Test] public void UnionGetEnumerator()
00587             {
00588                 int LENGTH = 100;
00589 
00590                 int[] array1 = new int[LENGTH], array2 = new int[LENGTH];
00591 
00592                 for(int i = 0; i < LENGTH; i++)
00593                 {
00594                     array1[i] = i;
00595                     array2[i] = i / 2;
00596                 }
00597 
00598                 ICollection union = Collection.Union(array1, array2);
00599 
00600                 Assert.AreEqual(LENGTH, union.Count, 
00601                     "#A00 Unexpected union count.");
00602 
00603                 foreach(int i in union)
00604                     Assert.IsTrue(i >= 0 && i < LENGTH,
00605                         "#A01-" + i + " Unexpected union item.");
00606             }
00607         }
